      • setNanoTime

        public Log4jLogEvent.Builder setNanoTime(long nanoTime)
        Sets the nano time for the event.
        参数:
        nanoTime - The value of the running Java Virtual Machine's high-resolution time source when the event was created.
        返回:
        this builder

      • build

        public Log4jLogEvent build()
        从接口复制的说明: Builder
        Builds the object after all configuration has been set. This will use default values for any unspecified attributes for the object.
        指定者:
        build 在接口中 Builder<LogEvent>
        返回:
        the configured instance.
